description:
Teddy The Adventurer brings joy to every youngling, as well as brings educational value. 
Meet The adventurous Teddy The Wanderer and visit his uncle who lives deep into the mountains. Join the unforgettable field trip and learn the basics of art, color mixing, and shape recognition with the worldâ€™s most charming bear!

Traverse the colorful locations full of thoughtfully designed details, and have fun solving dozens of puzzles! Younger and older - everyone will find the wandering among the nature amusing and enjoyable!
name: Teddy The Wanderer: Mountain Hike
intro: Numerous mini-games to keep children entertained, beautiful hand-painted graphics, soothing music, and a violence-free story - all in one game!
